channel.title: [613] Anadyr Framework
channel.description:
Hello My name is John. This is my project thread.. First off i want to say this is my second framework my first i decided not to share and worked/used it for 3-5months.. but anyway here you go..
[CENTER] [B]Revision : [U]613[/U][/B]
[COLOR=Green]Green[/COLOR] = Completed [COLOR=Purple]Purple[/COLOR] = Current task [COLOR=Red]Red [/COLOR]= Have not Started
[B][COLOR=Purple] Goals![/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR=Purple]Lobby:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]` World List ` ` Full Welcome ` ` Character Creation `[/COLOR] [COLOR=Purple]`Packet Handling `[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]` Clan Chat ` ` Friends List `[/COLOR] --------------------------------------------- [COLOR=Purple]Game:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Purple]` GPI `[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]` GPN `[/COLOR] [COLOR=Purple]` Skills ` ` Rendering ` `Packet Handling[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]`walking ` ` pathfinding ` ` player interaction ` ` mulitplayer `[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Purple] Core[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Purple]Networking: Jboss Netty[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green] ` Update Server `[/COLOR] [COLOR=Purple] ` MySQL Implementation `[/COLOR] [COLOR=SeaGreen] ` Packet Encyption/Decryption ` [/COLOR]
[COLOR=Blue]=Media=[/COLOR]
Pics: [IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/4627/ondemand.png[/img] [IMG]http://img517.imageshack.us/img517/1584/39244976.png[/img] [IMG]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/1127/93096984.png[/img] [IMG]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/82/loginxl.png[/img]
Videos: In Action: (includes Last Logged) [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=246kw0j&s=7]Video - TinyPic - Free Image Hosting, Photo Sharing & Video Hosting[/url] [/CENTER]
Will be adding more soon!
Credits:
Hotyute Deserves 25% for mysql help i was having trouble.. Lazaro/Discarded 5% laz for making 613 client and discardick for releasing
Steve - Inspiration and technique, being there as a friend thanks steve
